title: Generate Remote Kiosk Access
description: Create a temporary access link for an employee to punch in/out from any device when the kiosk PC is unavailable.
expiration_hint: How long should this link remain valid?
max_uses_hint: How many times can this link be used? (1-100)
copied_description: The access link has been copied to your clipboard.
scan_qr: Scan QR Code with Mobile Device
instructions: Share this link or QR code with the employee. They can use it to punch in/out from any device with a camera. The link will expire automatically.
success_description: The temporary access link has been created successfully.
error_copy_failed: Failed to copy URL to clipboard.
